resources.string: За да използвате Ecosys, моля, инсталирайте го на другите си устройства и ги свържете към същата Wifi мрежа :D \n\n Посетете: https://thaaoblues.github.io/ecosys
Приемам Largage Aerien\? Име на файла:
Приемате ли MULTI Largage Aerien\? идва от:
Select a device to send a Largage Aerien
First feature of Ecosys : Largage Aerien, It is just AirDrop but better because it is open-source.
Second feature of Ecosys : You can synchronize any folder between any of your devices (pictures, documents…), it will update whenever they are on the same network !
Third feature of Ecosys : Our markeplace let you install apps that will use Ecosys to synchronise their data between your devices !
Last feature of Ecosys : You can activate "Backup mode" on any of your synchronisation task so anything you delete on this device will not be deleted on the others ! Usefull for your pictures ;)
Confirm that you want to let the app you are installing access Ecosys.
The app you are installing is giving Ecosys a wrong package name, it could be malicious !
App is not registered in Ecosys or is trying to access data that is not its own.
This action is not supported ( action flag may be misspelled )
